author: 0xevan
content:
Right. It's a blobscription specific problem.

It appears that if you have the same PNG file in the blob and make multiple copies, then they will all have the same reference hash.

author: 0xevan
content: Seems bizarre but I agree nothing seems to prevent this

author: __flcl
content: Blobs actually might be useful for something opposite to nfts, for some collectible content that has more value because it expires. Like newspaper that everyone reads, but few collect as an evidence of epoch.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: I think there was some website that did podcasts in blobs
